executionPlan.name: SecondDerivativeOfRequestsInFlightFinder
executionPlan.description: This will find the second derivative of the number of requests in flight over a minute.
executionPlan.queryExpressions: from lbStats3#window.stratos:secondDerivative(1 min, in_flight_requests) select cluster_id,partition_id,in_flight_requests as count group by cluster_id,partition_id insert into second_derivative_of_requests_stats;
